MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the ML8 postcode area of Carluke affecting properties in Muirside Head Cottage and surrounding areas. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs to overhead electrical equipment near to Bushel Hill caused by third party damage, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.30pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2.23pm on Wednesday 24th March 2021.
